name: Speedy Car Racer - Free Craft Traffic Game of Blocky Mustang
name_original: Speedy Car Racer - Free Craft Traffic Game of Blocky Mustang
description:
Blocky Traffic Speedy Racer is an amazing arcade racing game.

Your dream has always been to be a champion of the illegal street races of Mine City. Mine City is a pixelated city full of blocky stuff.
You steal a new sports car, a red mustang, and begin to drive to practice for the night.
Police is looking for you so you must be fast. If they see you they will chase you at full speed. Even with pixelated wheels they drive really fast!

If you love sports cars and racing games this four wheels adventure is for you!

Drive your mustang through Mine City pixelated street traffic and try to be one of the fastest drivers in the global leaderboards. Put your new pixelated racing wheels and compete against your friends to be the best!
Don't be too slow or you will get caught by the cops. Police are really fast and they're chasing you!

Mine City streets are full of obstacles you should avoid, as well as other drivers sport cars, trucks, taxi, police, and buses. Drive fast and collect all the gold coins.
Use powerups to cheat death and don't crash. Police is chasing you, use coins to upgrade the powerups.

* Dash and dodge as fast as you can!
* Swipe to do lightning fast curves and drift!
* Online leaderboards and achievements!
* Cool blocky pixelated graphics!
* Collect coins to extend your powers!
* Update your mustang color in the car shop!

Go drive chasing the horizon! Mine City drivers are counting on you!
